title: Take Down
description: GAY BDSM EROTICA. Lucas Devero is 25 years old and living in San Francisco with everything going for him--hot tech job, sick car, killer body, and all the college boys he wants. But hot-stuff Lucas needs to know what it feels like to lose control. And Jake Heller, an older guy with a chest that could stop a truck, is ready to take him down.
author: S.F. Tanner
